Ohh great, more Ahri. Im kinda surprised no one has ships with her, but then again I doubt anyone really wants to be with her.

trust me, people have LOTS of ships for her. she's pretty much one of those characters that people can ship with just about anyone and it would make a certain amount of sense (like the new fire emblem games :p). 
Canon wise, it would be a pretty bad move for Riot to try and ship her with someone specific because of the fact people have so many ships for her. People would go nuts. 
Hell, just the fact she's even friends with another champ leaves some... "mixed" feelings to say the least.
